Name: Seated statue of Sa-khentikheti
Description: The head, neck and parts of the shoulder straps of this seated statue are now missing. The figure is sitting with crossed legs on a pedestal. The entire body is covered by a smooth garment; only the hands are visible. The left hand lies flat on the chest, the right holds a tip of the garment in a clenched fist. On the pedestal is a carved hieroglyphic inscription.
